website_summaries.verdict: With a copper finish, this versatile set accentuates both modern and rustic decor and offers all the features you could ask for.
pros: Variable coarseness settings are among the easiest to adjust
Standout stainless steel with copper finish is unique and attractive
Magnetic lid is convenient and does a superior job of staying put
Sturdy glass body, stainless steel top, and ceramic grinder with reinforced housing delivers all-round quality and durability
cons: Included stand is angled for aesthetic appeal but isn't the most practical as grinders are easily knocked over

customer_reviews.title: They look good and they are larger than expected but they don't ...
customer_reviews.text: They look good and they are larger than expected but they don't grind well. If you want big pepper flakes and a fast throughput this isn't the grinder for you. The lids are magnetic, barely.... they come off easily and the jarring from carrying them downstairs (empty BTW) the lid came off one of them. The grind isn't coarse under the best circumstance, even unscrewing one until it came apart (and the lid wouldn't close far before that. The base tilts the shakers in different directions. It may make it easier to grab, but it looks weird. I'll keep them on the table, once I find a better stand, but I'll use a different set for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after 4 months of use with Salt
customer_reviews.text: I originally loved this grinder set. However it saddens me to say, they don't last long. Which is a real shame because I really enjoyed these. The pepper grinder has not rusted yet, but the salt has made the metal turn to rust. Too expensive to only last 4 months. UPDATE: Fantastic customer service! The company contacted me and is sending replacements. Very pleased with how they handled this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Grinder Set!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! I had tried an earlier version and had a problem with the coarseness adjustment knob. The manufacturer listened to my concerns, made product design adjustments and now the knob stays snug without issue. I like this grinder set a lot now. Looks and performs GREAT!! If you are looking for a Salt and Pepper Grinder set choose this one!!
customer_reviews.author: JohnAClark

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but come apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the good reviews, the covers that prevent pepper from falling out and I love copper, so it fit in with my kitchen. HOWEVER, I have experienced "peppercorn dump" 8 times, causing me to pick out the whole load of peppercorns from my recipe. So now, after much frustration and bad words, I am replacing them and throwing them away.
customer_reviews.author: BAH

customer_reviews.title: Best Salt & Pepper Mills I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: While shopping for a new salt & pepper mill set, I came across these and I knew immediately that they would look great in our kitchen/dining area as we have copper trim up in our coffer-ed ceiling. They are very easy to use and I love the fact that the lids are magnetic so you don't have to worry about them falling off the glass/metal container. I'm not crazy about the black plastic holder that came with them as it is awkward how they sit at different angles. BUT I LOVE THE SALT & PEPPERS MILLS!! I would highly recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful! Larger than I expected them to be....a bit too large to use as "table-top" set, but lovely sitting on the kitchen counter. The only thing I don't like is the odd angles that the stand holds them in. Would prefer that the stand would just hold them straight up. That said....they are overall a very nice quality and absolutely gorgeous. We like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Still figuring out the grind settings but so far it's a winner. Elegant looking, nice capacity, won't need to refill as often. The burnished copper look grabbed me immediately. I like pepper and sea salt dispensed from the top; no mess like with bottom dispensers. I took off a star in the ratings because the magnetic lid on one mill is weak but it still functions.
customer_reviews.author: Pericles

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because it had the best rating on the shakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had the best rating on the shakers. That being said they are really beautiful, BUT they take forever to grind my black pepper and that’s the reason I bought this was for the black pepper. It just takes too much time and it does it so sparsely that it takes forever to get how much you want. And the grinder on the inside pops out so easily. But I guess I just have to get used to it. It’s pretty and comes with a stand and that’s all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Size and shape comfortable to use and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used these grinders yet. Based on promptness of delivery, attractive packaging and size and shape of grinders, I’d say I’m glad I bought them to try. Really like the copper finish! Took off one star only because I haven’t used them yet and cannot comment on quality of spice grinding mechanism. I expect I’ll like them very much. Hopefully, they won’t corrode like another pair of Copper grinders I have. Recommend if you want copper accents in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: iggypals3

customer_reviews.title: These are Only Okay
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do not like about these grinders is that the when grinding pepper corns, not a lot comes out. I have sea salt in the salt grinder and tons comes out with a very slight twisting motion. With the pepper on the other hand, you have to twist it back and forth (or keep going in circles) and it takes for-ev-er. Both grinders are the same so it's not like one is for salt and one is for pepper so I don't know what the deal is and why the pepper takes so much longer. They will make do but I'm not happy with this purchase. :(
customer_reviews.author: msjacky

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality, excellent aesthetic too!
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent quality, totally giftable too. If you’ve never experienced fresh ground pepper, it will really elevate your food to the next level. I filled mine with black peppercorns and pink salt, both available on amazon. The icing on the cake are the magnetic tops! So easy to just put them back on when you’re done! The copper looks great on the counter too. There’s a ton of these to choose from on amazon, but I’m glad I got these!
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent salt and pepper grinders
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product, easy to use and very stylish. But no support for using. No insert to say what salts to buy. Salt to grind is not readily available. I managed to call a salt company and find a sen gris that is excellent and works perfectly. I tihnk that type of info should be in the product. Maybe even pack in a small sample or a coupon for buying the salt, etc. Or make a deal with a salt company to supply their customers their first load of salt on a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Finally gave up
customer_reviews.text: Bought about a year ago. Attractive and generally worked well except when it didn't. What I mean is after the 3rd time the top came off with the spring, grinding mechanism, and chunks of salt/peppercorns fell into the dish I was cooking, I decided enough was enough and tossed them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT GRIND. PERIOD.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product 0 stars but I’m not sure it would be included so I give it a 1 for looks. It looks good that’s it. I also want to state that I have never written a product review never mind a negative one. I am a huge cook and I am so upset right now that I spent the money on these and they DO NOT GRIND. PERIOD. Just a horrible rip off. They slightly ground at first so I’ve been working with them . Changing the pepper to salt and vice versa. 2 months into it and they just don’t grind at all. And I’m past the return date. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: florence G.

customer_reviews.title: Two Identical Grinders
customer_reviews.text: so, I misread, I guess. I thought these would be a pepper grinder and a salt shaker. But it is two identical grinders. There are no fitments, so I can only use one, since I do not grind salt. They are attractive, the grinder mechanism seems sturdy and will probably last a long time! My only actual criticism is that they are so fat, it is difficult for my rather large hands to handle. Do wish there was a matching shaker available.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Thyme

customer_reviews.title: No course grind pepper or good output
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read reviews about the pepper grinder. Output is small and impossible to get more than a fine grind. Have adjusted many time and bolt falls out when going for course grind. Would have returned but missed the 30 day window. Don’t buy if you like course ground pepper!
customer_reviews.author: lynn geneva

customer_reviews.title: One of the grinders works great but the other completely broke
customer_reviews.text: One of the grinders works great but the other completely broke. I only started using it 3 weeks ago and already it isn't grinding properly and the top is completely broken. I'm not sure if there is a way to receive a refund but I will end up having to throw these out and buy another set. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to fill, unlike many grinders. The oil rubbed bronze look is nice. The JCP logo is not as subtle as I would like it to be, but that is not a deal breaker. It comes with a fun little base that causes the grinders to set at opposite angles. Customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: Evette

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these grinders! The holder it comes with is visually pleasing. I do warn that due to my own negligence, I was spraying Lysol counter cleaner o the counter I had these grinders on, and the mist did get on the copper tops and spotted them. I don’t mind it tho as they look used and rusticy now. Just a warning to beware what you spray around these! Very cute, work extremely well. Pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality,  Order the salt and pepper though.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well made quality product. Received today and used. Very easy to use and no issues with clogging or jams like some I had in the past. NOTE: Peeps, order salt and peppercorns if you order this product. Luckily I did. They do not come with salt or pepper. They are empty. It might be stated in description and I might overlooked that. Just a heads up to order the peppercorns and salt.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny B

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: These are overpriced pieces of junk. Literally fell apart on us three times in the first week. We had the grinder set pretty narrow too and the damn thing keeps exploding to pieces. We had our old cheap walmart ones for like 6 years with no issues till they literally rusted up lol. This overpriced crap didnt make it 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Klassy

customer_reviews.title: These did not last very long.  I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift 2017. They did well for a bit but that did not last long. The ceramic grinder falls off on both and the grinding quality is horrible. I have better luck with the grinders in the spice isle at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Esquandolas

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Functional. Base is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the grinders themselves. They turn smoothly and are beautiful from a decor standpoint; however, I hated the stand that they came with & threw that in the trash after a week of "OH CRAP! I thought I sat the bottle upright & now it's falling over!" moments. LOL
customer_reviews.author: August Muse

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little extra and get better quality elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The size and color are great. Durability? Awful. One of them (one I use for peppercorns) just unscrews every couple of months dumping all of the pepper contents into my dish as I’m cranking. I’ve taken it apart, cleaned it, and tightened it very well but it continues to do this. Extremely frustrating when making a dish you can’t easily fish the corns out and have to dump it and start over. I finally got fed up and ordered something better.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda P.

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a salt and pepper set that looks good and works great. This truly is an elegant set that looks good on the table. More importantly, the ability to change the grind on the fly is pretty handy, and the grinders are of high quality and should last. We'll see, but for now, we are happy we bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of turns to get much pepper out and no satisfying "crunch".  Grinds coarse salt really well though.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a lot of turns to get much pepper out and no satisfying "crunch". Grinds coarse salt really well though. I guess I can't really recommend it as a set because it just does not grind pepper well at all, no matter how I adjust the grinder wheel. The seller was great, sent me another set for free to make sure 1st set wasn't a fluke defect, but 2nd set same thing. The grinding mechanism is just too fine to grind peppercorns efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: JSMCO

customer_reviews.title: Grinders delight
customer_reviews.text: These salt and pepper grinders are really nice and they look like the pics on line. They blend I beautifully with either of my kitchens and I really chose them for look but they work well too. Well spent money and very jazzy looking. The wooden holder is a lil cheesy in that the wood don’t really accent or match the color or the grinders I don’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Xavia D. Reed

customer_reviews.title: They look great. Salt mill works great, but not the pepper mill
customer_reviews.text: They look great. The salt grinder works great. The pepper mill cannot be adjusted to give a course enough grind. As I was adjusting it to get the grind I want, the grinder parts fell off into my sauce along with a handful of pepper corns. I should have believed the other reviews stating this exact problem. It takes a lot of grinding to get a decent amount of pepper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made product
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Stopped grinding well very soon after bought. They were dropping chunks of salt and pepper then one just fell apart into my food as I was cooking. Also the stand is ridiculous. Puts them on odd and opposite angles - they just look silly.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Salt and pepper
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw these out. They kept falling apart and I ruined a couple of meals because the inner apparatice kept falling out and my meal would end of over salted (or peppered). This happened with both of the grinders. I put them back together several times but it kept happening so I couldn't trust them in meal preparation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product as gifts for our extended family for Christmas and got one for ourselves. We are really embarrassed now because of a number of flaws: a) The size of the grind is not adjustable. If you try to get a larger cut the cheap plastic cutter falls out; b) after four months the cheap plastic cutter gets dull and produces less making you spend more time grinding; c) the copper tops came off of the lid, they were not even glued. The disposable salt and pepper grinders (with product inside) that you can buy in grocery stores fo 3$ are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Ludwig: Author, Dysfunctional Practices that Kill your Safety Culture

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: Will not grind the pepper!!! I have tried to change the settings. The size of the flakes change but hardly anything comes out! Cute set, the bronze is brighter than expected but I’ve gone back to using my regular salt and pepper set.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Brisbin

customer_reviews.title: A disaster
customer_reviews.text: I've had the bottom of these grinders fall out on me multiple times, ruining dishes in a shower of salt or pepper corns. I've tinkered with them for two years but they continue to fail on me. I bought these because they have great amazon reviews, but my set is horrible. 1 star, 20 ruined meals, placing this item in the garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get better!
customer_reviews.text: We had the tall clear plastic salt & pepper grinder kind for more than a decade. Then one cracked & fell apart. We bought these for trips etc, but they work so well, dispatch se so nicely and pricessly, they now sit on or stove top. LERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Weird tilted base
customer_reviews.text: Great looking set, material quality is high. The only odd thing is the included base for storing the grinders, I don't understand why the base tilts the salt and pepper grinders forward and backwards. It would have been much better to have the base hold them level.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I love these salt and pepper grinders. I just recently received them. They look just like the picture. They are gorgeous, the perfect size, easy to hold, a comfortable fit to my hand. The copper brushed tops are so pretty! They are easy to use and I love the magnetic lids. I hope that I have many years of happiness using them!. I would recommend them. 3/5/2020 Update--After using these for a little over three weeks, the pepper grinder fell apart. The grind adjuster started slipping, and fell apart. I wouldn't recommend these, but a better set.
customer_reviews.author: methodmom

customer_reviews.title: We really like the look and feel of these grinders
customer_reviews.text: We really like the look and feel of these grinders. They were actually a little bigger than I thought they were going to be, which is a good thing.The magnetic lids are very convenient and do a good job of staying tight. The only think I'm not crazy about is the base that they set in. The insets hold the grinders at a slight angle, maybe 15-20 degrees, opposite of one another. It's kind of neat to display but not as functional as if straight up and down. They seem to be decent quality and a solid value for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Freemer

customer_reviews.title: These grinders look great and arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: These grinders look great and arrived quickly. However the actual functionality of them is why I gave them 3 stars. The grinder I put salt in works great, the other grinder that I put pepper in however does not. It seems to have trouble grinding and isn't able to grind very much up at a time meaning ur setting there grinding for a while to get a little bit of pepper out. If your just wanting some grinders that look nice then these are for you, but if you intend to use them for cooking and what not I would suggest shopping around.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these three years ago and after constant use, they are just starting to lose their grinding power. Getting another set and will use the old pair for specialty salts and peppers. Nice looking, copper stays copper and works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The grinders are way better quality than a $15 version of another brand available ...
customer_reviews.text: The grinders are way better quality than a $15 version of another brand available on Amazon. These grinders are extremely easy to use and have an easy stick-free coarseness dial. The grinding procedure itself is extremely smooth and is great for people with arthritis. I've only had them about a week so I can't testify to their longevity. If they continue the performance they've shown so far throughout the next year I will be extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, these grinders have started to fall apart. The mechanism inside (gears) have a loaded spring which causes the ceramic grinder to become dislodged, which causes salt & pepper to simply fall out, emptying its contents onto your food. Virtually making a waste of your meal. Would not recommend, nor ever buy again.
customer_reviews.author: brad paul

customer_reviews.title: but I have grown to love the quirkiness of the shakers positioned with a tilt ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful-love the burnished copper-fits in perfectly with my copper kitchen. At first, I didn't care for the holder, but I have grown to love the quirkiness of the shakers positioned with a tilt in the holder. It's unique and interesting. The salt shaker works perfectly, but no matter what we've tried, the pepper shaker does not grind well at all. It takes forever to grind pepper. I'd be very appreciative if the seller would provide some feedback as to how we can fix the pepper grinder to work more effectively. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne E. Conda

customer_reviews.title: Really lovely - until they break
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a while and really liked them. The copper part came off of the plastic caps, but I just glued them back on and everything was fine. Eventually, however, the pepper grinder's innards would NOT stay together. We've done everything we can to fix it, but without fail it breaks every time we try to use it, spilling whole peppercorns into the food and ruining whatever dish you're making. These are just too expensive to fall apart so easily.
customer_reviews.author: K and J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Get them!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love these! The lids help keep my counters clean. Love that the canister is glass, not plastic. They hold a very large amount of salt and pepper so refilling is less often and the opening is wide enough that I don’t need to use a funnel. The finish is gorgeous and they grind so smoothly! Easy on the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Heim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality glass mills for dining or cooking use
customer_reviews.text: Well I've had a can of coarse seal salt in my pantry for 2 years or so and didn't have a salt grinder to use. Enter the purchase of the salt and pepper mills that were on lightning deal. They work as intended and brass accents look good on dinner table. Magnetic tops are great as well and the fact the mills stand upright so no product is left on dining table after use. The black plastic holder went to recycling as it didn't look good on the table. Not sure how much they get used by other consumers.
customer_reviews.author: Castiel

customer_reviews.title: Great option for grinders!
customer_reviews.text: These grinders are easy to use, and look great sitting out in our kitchen. We previously used wood grinders that you stored upright, so they would always leave little piles of salt and pepper underneath wherever you sat them, and it drove me crazy. These grinders have magnetic tops, which is super convenient and also ensures that those little piles don't happen anymore! I also love that they are glass, as we use pink salt and multi-colored peppercorns, so they look nice sitting in the kitchen. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Does not grind very well. Durable. Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Update: after a few weeks while it does look very nice, it does not grind very well at all (especially the salt). And it’s pretty annoying, so ii dropped it from a 5 to a 3 Star. (2.5 is what i wanted) Original review: Bigger and heavier than I though they were going to be based on the dimensions, which is great. They do not feel cheap or flimsy. Good quality stuff. Plus they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: All the copper pieces fell off shortly after buying. Would't waste my money again, as now I cant refill one of the shakers.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: A great grinder set.
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this grinder set. Well made with a solid feel and easy to use. Adjustable for your coarseness preference. Magnetic tops are a nice touch. Looks good on the counter when not in use. Would recommend to anyone who likes fresh ground salt and pepper on their food.
customer_reviews.author: R2

customer_reviews.title: We've been using this set for some time and are completely delighted. The grinder (mill) mechanism should last a long ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our third mill set. The first was wood and was difficult to keep clean. The second was similar to this set, but of an inferior design. We've been using this set for some time and are completely delighted. The grinder (mill) mechanism should last a long time, having a far superior design. The magnetic tops are super! They lift off easily, but remain securely in place. Kudos to JCPKitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Secondary Roads

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't grind pepper well.
customer_reviews.text: The grinders aren't very good. They look great, but the one I use for pepper barely works at all. The top of the salt grinder came off as well after maybe two months. It's an easy fix, though. I can just use super glue or whatever. My main issue is how poorly these actually grind anything.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great look and value.
customer_reviews.text: They came in good shape and packaged nicely. The base seems a little too plastic but not a deal breaker. They work well and hold a good bit of product. However, if you are looking for a strong grind, these grind real well, but tend to feel a little loose when turning the grinder. This is a great thing for me since I have problems with my hands. All in all , these are a great product and I would buy them again and refer everyone.
customer_reviews.author: chris pfaender

customer_reviews.title: Great set -- issue with ceramic grinder
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal set--very aesthetically pleasing and suits the rest of my kitchen's more rustic setting. I have had an issue with one of the ceramic grinders; the lower portion of the ceramic grinder chipped off. As far as I can tell this hasn't affected the quality of the grind in any way, but I'm a bit surprised by how quickly it happened (under twenty-four hours after having received the set.) I use manual ceramic grinders for a multitude of applications; this is the first time I've had this happen. Hoping to hear from the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Set! The quality is amazing! The glass is durable and heavy duty and the copper grinder lids are very Saturday and well made. I love this set! Highly recommend! The bamboo tray is such a nice touch as well to keep them displayed together.
customer_reviews.author: The Vanity Luxe

customer_reviews.title: Size adjustable grind!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the salt and peppers. I have copper all of my kitchen, goes very nicely. Also, the adjustable size of the grind is great- especially love that you can make pepper very small, I do not like big chunks of pepper! The only thing that I don’t like, is the stand it came with, has them facing in different directions and takes up space on the table, I just don’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: These shakers are the perfect size and they look beautiful in my kitchen. I needed to replace some old shakers that were not working well. I am so glad I purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: They're Okay...
customer_reviews.text: These look good in my kitchen/dinning area. The functional ability is not that great. Even though I've adjusted the grinder, one (the one I have pepper in) still doesn't really grind (I'm developing carpel tunnel for twisting so much - lol).
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set
customer_reviews.text: Great looking set, as pictured. Easy to set the coarseness level of the grinder. Comes with a simple base that allows you to display the set, with each grinder inclined in opposite direction. Highly recommend to others looking for a nice salt and pepper grinder set. Have had it for a couple of weeks now, no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are made very well, I love the magnetic top and they are pretty. I don’t care for the stand they come with, but I didn’t know they even came with one, so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: CZM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well made set
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used but a few days so I can’t speak to long term hold up, but they are great size, easy to handle and use. Would repurchase for self or gift.
customer_reviews.author: L. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work well.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap construction. Most importantly cannot actually grind peppercorns. Courseness adjustment doesnt work right.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Calaway

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, they look great, the container is glass (not cheap plastic) and the magnetic top is very secure (I confirm that the top stays attached if you turn the container upside down and shake). I use the pink Himalaya salt, the grains are very fine when they come out. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Great color good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been Been looking at salt and pepper shakers that grind that are in Rose gold/copper color. So that They match my kitchen cupboard handles. They match perfectly they are sleek and work well. I love them every time I see them in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: cjbates

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These grinders are not adjustable, and are not very strong. They only grind to a fine powder, and are VERY SLOW. I will be looking for a new set. Very disappointed with the purchase from the first time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they are short and fit on my “Behind the pantry door” spice rack. They feel and look great quality. My only issue is after I hand washed them beforehand it was very difficult to get the tops of them to dry out, even after popping out the parts. I’m very happy now that that’s done though!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey T

customer_reviews.title: Works great, attractive
